thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 6 of 489
thread.title: Richard

author: Richard
title: Richard
text: I ordered 2 items. The first was thinner than I expected but useable the second was very thin material and not useable for my application I will repurpose as a protective bag. The thickness measures should be industry standards - gauge and mills seem to vary by manufacturer so its hit and miss sometimes. Luckily the first item was a special discounted purchase so it gets 4 stars.
